content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu Wang, I am glad you are interested in my apartment. I am sure you will find it very convenient and comfortable. Let's start the negotiation. What is the rental price you are considering?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think a reasonable price for this apartment would be around 500 Euro. It is a great location and the apartment is in good condition. What do you think?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, but I think we can do better. This apartment is in the city center, close to all important facilities. I think a price of 600 Euro would be more appropriate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point of view. However, the apartment is unfurnished and that adds to the cost. I can offer 550 Euro. It is a good compromise between your offer and my initial offer.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I see your point about the unfurnished apartment. However, the location of the apartment and its size are both very favorable. I think we can find a middle ground. How about 575 Euro? This is closer to your offer and still represents a fair price for this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is a fair point. I think we can agree on 575 Euro. I agree to the price of [575] Euro!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [575] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for renting my apartment, Mr. Wang. I am sure you will be happy here. Let's proceed with the lease agreement.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Sure, Mr. Wang. Let's proceed with the lease agreement. I will send you the lease agreement soon. If you have any questions or concerns, please let me know.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I am looking forward to moving into the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: You are welcome, Mr. Wang. I am sure you will be happy in the apartment. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I don't have any more questions or concerns. Have a great day!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: You are welcome, Mr. Wang. I wish you a great day too. If you have any questions or concerns about the lease agreement in the future, please do not hesitate to contact me.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
